items.sentence: You might've fooled Tom, but you didn't fool me.
Tom climbed up so high that we couldn't see him.
Tom is three, and Mary has just turned thirteen.
Having failed four times, he didn't try anymore.
I'll have two hot dogs with mustard and ketchup.
I can't for the life of me remember her address.
Don't shout like that. I can hear you perfectly.
The lady's funeral was held at the local church.
The priest participated in the children's games.
How much money do we have left to spend on food?
Have you already spent all the money I gave you?
Maybe we shouldn't spend any more time together.
I do hope we can put that behind us and move on.
We hope everyone will come and have a good time.
I hope that we get everything that we asked for.
That would be putting the cart before the horse.
My father planted this tree the year I was born.
It wouldn't be a good idea to lend money to Tom.
I know it's highly unlikely anybody can help me.
I know I shouldn't eat this, but I think I will.
I know that you won't be in Australia next year.
You want to go to Australia with Tom, don't you?
Tom, Mary, John and Alice all live in Australia.
Tom will be coming back to Australia in October.
Tom was only in Australia for a couple of weeks.
The dog was busy burying his bone in the garden.
Many people use cash machines to withdraw money.
You probably haven't yet finished your homework.
If you always eat that much, you'll gain weight.
I guarantee you that that's not going to happen.
Do you know how late the flower shop stays open?
Whether Tom will do that or not isn't important.
I'm the one who convinced Tom to try to do that.
I didn't know Tom and John were Mary's brothers.
When Tom was a baby, he got dropped on his head.
It isn't clear what the writer is trying to say.
Tom's rude reply provoked Mary to slap his face.
It smells like this gun has been fired recently.
Since I have nothing left to do, I'm going home.
I played volleyball with my friends last Monday.
Tom is often late to work because he oversleeps.
Tom donated a kidney to somebody he didn't know.
I have to admit that doing this was a good idea.
You're the only person that I feel really cares.
When did you become such a good conservationist?
I think you should buy yourself a new chain saw.
I think that you should take that job in Boston.
When was the last time that you ate a persimmon?
Did you switch the light off in the living room?
That's not the main reason Tom ought to do that.
